projets.title: Added functionality: impose geolocation
proposal: Collecting information without warning is not that important
Declare in an info message that if the user wants to register, they have to accept geolocation
Forcing the activation of geolocation on mobile phones without saying anything
projets.information:
Are users informed of how their confidential information will be used? Is the information on the use of the data collected made accessible and easy to consult, and has the DPO been consulted? Are the checkboxes on the forms not pre-filled?
The data that users entrust to us is the responsibility of the company, and users must be kept informed of the care that the company takes to ensure the confidentiality of their data.
The RGPD imposes a framework for personal data, but does not cover other categories of data that deserve the same attention and precautions.

projets.title: Reducing the impact of accommodation
proposal: Use old machines lying around in the cellar
Install 3 small wind turbines behind the building
Invest in a contract to have the electricity consumption of each substation checked with a view to having them replaced
projets.information:
Is the PUE less than or equal to 1.2?
The total power consumed by the data center compared to the power consumed by the servers gives the overall efficiency of the entire infrastructure.
The hosting technical file tracks the energy efficiency and PUE of the sites.

projets.title: Promoting low-impact behaviour
proposal: Train the frontend team in GreenIT
Test the weight of each image using a tool that allows you to evaluate the volume of images.
projets.information:
Is a maximum volume of components transferred to the user device defined?
All the components transferred to the user device have an impact on network transfers and on the processing required to handle them on the user terminal. It is important to reduce and control this volume.
A good solution is to use a Project Framework Sheet.
